title: FATAL validator: Could not wait for validator activation
body:
```
[2019-05-12 18:08:19]  INFO validator: Not yet included in state... publicKey=0xa7d5b4abcafe4fd7ae4a57e4 status=UNKNOWN_STATUS                                                         │···········
[2019-05-12 18:08:26]  INFO validator: Waiting for validator to be activated in the beacon chain                                                                                       │···········
[2019-05-12 18:08:26]  INFO validator: Not yet included in state... publicKey=0xa7d5b4abcafe4fd7ae4a57e4 status=UNKNOWN_STATUS                                                         │···········[2019-05-12 18:08:32]  INFO validator: Waiting for validator to be activated in the beacon chain                                                                                       │···········
[2019-05-12 18:08:32]  INFO validator: Not yet included in state... publicKey=0xa7d5b4abcafe4fd7ae4a57e4 status=UNKNOWN_STATUS                                                         │···········[2019-05-12 18:08:38]  INFO validator: Waiting for validator to be activated in the beacon chain                                                                                       │···········
[2019-05-12 18:08:38]  INFO validator: Not yet included in state... publicKey=0xa7d5b4abcafe4fd7ae4a57e4 status=UNKNOWN_STATUS                                                         │···········[2019-05-12 18:08:44]  INFO validator: Waiting for validator to be activated in the beacon chain                                                                                       │···········
[2019-05-12 18:08:44]  INFO validator: Not yet included in state... publicKey=0xa7d5b4abcafe4fd7ae4a57e4 status=UNKNOWN_STATUS                                                         │···········
[2019-05-12 18:08:50]  INFO validator: Waiting for validator to be activated in the beacon chain                                                                                       │···········
[2019-05-12 18:08:50]  INFO validator: Not yet included in state... publicKey=0xa7d5b4abcafe4fd7ae4a57e4 status=UNKNOWN_STATUS                                                         │···········
[2019-05-12 18:08:56] FATAL validator: Could not wait for validator activation: could not receive validator activation from stream: rpc error: code = Unknown desc = could not query co│···········
ntract to verify chain started: read tcp 172.17.0.2:38922->35.224.249.2:443: read: connection reset by peer                                                                            │···········
ligi@ethdev:~$           
```
the INFO messages where repeating this way since hours and then the fatal crash.

similar but different enough to add here - again after some time of running:

```
[2019-05-13 02:10:22]  INFO validator: Waiting for validator to be activated in the beacon chain
[2019-05-13 02:10:22]  INFO validator: Not yet included in state... publicKey=0xa7d5b4abcafe4fd7ae4a57e4 status=UNKNOWN_STATUS
[2019-05-13 02:10:28]  INFO validator: Waiting for validator to be activated in the beacon chain
[2019-05-13 02:10:28]  INFO validator: Not yet included in state... publicKey=0xa7d5b4abcafe4fd7ae4a57e4 status=UNKNOWN_STATUS
[2019-05-13 02:10:35]  INFO validator: Waiting for validator to be activated in the beacon chain
[2019-05-13 02:10:35]  INFO validator: Not yet included in state... publicKey=0xa7d5b4abcafe4fd7ae4a57e4 status=UNKNOWN_STATUS
[2019-05-13 02:10:41] FATAL validator: Could not wait for validator activation: could not receive validator activation from stream: rpc error: code = Unknown desc = could not query contract to verify chain started: tls: use of closed connection
ligi@ethdev:~$

```

I got a similar error also:

```go
[2019-05-15 01:56:42]  INFO node: Using custom parameter configuration
[2019-05-15 01:56:43]  INFO node: Starting validator node version=Git commit: c9ce8b524647e93820a56809cfcee78e64d19183. Built at: 2019-05-11 22:03:14+00:00
[2019-05-15 01:56:43]  INFO registry: Starting 2 services: [*prometheus.Service *client.ValidatorService]
[2019-05-15 01:56:43]  INFO prometheus: Starting service endpoint=:8080
[2019-05-15 01:56:43]  INFO validator: Initializing new validator service publicKey=0xb0e010e685ad7c4e19f715dd0661fe34f72729fb70813222d56b3843f1fa6ae1bd2b7dc6aa7176cd768adc896148e9440a3a5d56ce07bf7a9407812af718bd10994d5c3efe150d70acef19ed000ebdd1099a588b0e7c22770ec195806b873f02
[2019-05-15 01:56:43]  WARN validator: You are using an insecure gRPC connection! Please provide a certificate and key to use a secure connection.
[2019-05-15 01:56:43]  INFO validator: Successfully started gRPC connection
[2019-05-15 01:56:43]  INFO validator: Waiting for beacon chain start log from the ETH 1.0 deposit contract...
[2019-05-15 01:56:43]  INFO validator: Beacon chain initialized genesisTime=2019-04-29 19:57:00 +0000 UTC
[2019-05-15 01:56:43] FATAL validator: Could not wait for validator activation: could not receive validator activation from stream: rpc error: code = Internal desc = runtime error: invalid memory address or nil pointer dereference
```
